languages.text: A human tabletop game played across the Imperium of Man, similar to the ancient Terran game of chess.
languages.original_text: Настольная игра популярная на просторах Империума Человечества. Она напоминает древнюю Терранскую игру "шахматы".

traits.locale_text: A human tabletop game played across the Imperium of Man, similar to the ancient Terran game of chess.

languages.text: Настольная игра популярная на просторах Империума Человечества. Она напоминает древнюю Терранскую игру "шахматы".
Ein Brettspiel der Menschen, das im gesamten Imperium der Menschheit gespielt wird und dem alten terranischen Schachspiel ähnelt.
languages.original_text: A human tabletop game played across the Imperium of Man, similar to the ancient Terran game of chess.

traits.locale_text: Ein Brettspiel der Menschen, das im gesamten Imperium der Menschheit gespielt wird und dem alten terranischen Schachspiel ähnelt.

languages.text: Jeu de société humain pratiqué dans tout l'Imperium de l'Humanité et semblable à l'antique jeu d'échecs de Terra.
languages.original_text: A human tabletop game played across the Imperium of Man, similar to the ancient Terran game of chess.

traits.locale_text: Jeu de société humain pratiqué dans tout l'Imperium de l'Humanité, semblable à l'antique jeu d'échecs terrien.

languages.text: 人类帝国非常流行的桌面游戏，类似于古代泰拉流行过的象棋游戏。
languages.original_text: A human tabletop game played across the Imperium of Man, similar to the ancient Terran game of chess.

traits.locale_text: 人类帝国非常流行的桌面游戏，类似于古代泰拉流行过的象棋游戏。

languages.text: 古代地球のチェスゲームに似た、人類の帝国全体でプレイされる人間の卓上ゲーム。
languages.original_text: A human tabletop game played across the Imperium of Man, similar to the ancient Terran game of chess.

traits.locale_text: 古代地球（テラ）のチェスゲームに似た、人類の帝国全体でプレイされる人間の卓上ゲーム。

languages.text: Juego de mesa humano que se practica en todo el Imperium de la Humanidad, similar al antiguo ajedrez terrano.
languages.original_text: A human tabletop game played across the Imperium of Man, similar to the ancient Terran game of chess.

traits.locale_text: Juego de mesa humano que se practica en todo el Imperium de la Humanidad, similar al antiguo ajedrez terrano.

languages.text: İnsan İmparatorluğu'nun dört bir yanında oynanan ve kadim Terra oyunu satranca benzeyen, insanlara has bir masaüstü oyunu.
languages.original_text: A human tabletop game played across the Imperium of Man, similar to the ancient Terran game of chess.
